resources.string: \t\tA channel dedicated to making short self-development movies to help you become your greatest version.
\t\tAll great changes come from within. To work on yourself is to work on the world. With a new attitude we can learn to enjoy lives filled with harmony and abundance.

\t\tSpirituality is merely the practice of knowing your true self and discovering your passion, which has a much greater influence than you can imagine. All things are connected after all! New videos released every week.

\t\t Thank you for downloading this app.Please feel free to give anyfeedback/new ideas and share this app with a friend, using the share button in the top right corner on the front srceen. Have an awesome day!
